label: Is this request for initiation or continuation of therapy with Wegovy™ (semaglutide)?

children.label: Start of therapy
children.outcome: Initial Authorization for Wegovy™ (semaglutide) may be granted for 6 months when the criteria are met

children.label: Body mass index (BMI) meets either of the requirements:
BMI ≥ 30, if no applicable risk factors
BMI ≥ 27 with two or more of the following risk factors: coronary heart disease, dyslipidemia, hypertension, sleep apnea, type II diabetes
Body weight above 60 kg and an initial BMI corresponding to 30 kg/m² for adults (obese) by international cut-offs (excluding Saxenda® in pediatric patients 12 years of age and older)
Wegovy only covered for members 12 years of age or older
No malabsorption syndromes, cholestasis, pregnancy, and/or lactation
No history of an eating disorder (for example, anorexia, bulimia)

Previous failure of a weight loss treatment plan (e.g., nutritional counseling, exercise regimen, calorie/fat-restricted diet) in the past six months and will continue to follow as part of the treatment plan
Current medical status including nutritional or dietetic assessment
Current therapy for all medical conditions (including obesity), identifying specific treatments including medications
Current accurate height and weight measurements
No chronic opioid use concurrently with Contrave®
Member not concurrently on Victoza or Ozempic or other GLP-1 inhibitors (excluding Saxenda®)
Continuation of therapy
children.outcome: Reauthorization for Wegovy™ (semaglutide) may be granted for an additional 6-month PA when the criteria are met

children.label: The member achieves a weight loss of at least 5% of baseline weight
